description: A person is taking a bath, submerged in bubbles in a standard bathroom bathtub. Unexpectedly, several large tentacles of an octopus-like creature emerge from the water, coiling around the bather and draping over the side of the tub. This juxtaposition of a mundane activity with the sudden, surreal appearance of a giant sea creature creates an absurd situation. The scene presents a startling encounter within the confines of a private, domestic space.
caption: null
